night.text: Cloudy. Light precipitation in places. Wind around west 4-10, on coast in gusts up to 15 m/s. Air temperature -2..+3°C.
night.sea: Forecast for Baltic Sea valid 24 hours from 19:00 Nov 23 to 19:00 UTC Nov 24, 2018. Weather summary: southern periphery of Low.Warnings: Northern Baltic, Northern Gulf of Riga, Moonsund: west, southwest wind in gusts 14 m/s. Wave height at sea 1 to 2 m, in Northern Gulf of Riga 0,7 to 1,5 m, in Moonsund 0,3 to 0,8 m.Gulf of Finland: southwest, west in gusts 15 m/s. Wave height 1 to 2 m.Northern Baltic: at night west, northwest 6 to 11, in gusts 14 m/s, by day north, northwest 4 to 8, in gusts 12 m/s. Wave height at night 1 to 2 m. Locally some precipitation. Visibility moderate to good.Gulf of Finland: at night west, northwest 8 to 13, in gusts 16 m/s, by day northwest, north 6 to 10, in gusts 14 m/s. Wave height 1 to 2 m. Locally some precipitation. Visibility moderate to good.Moonsund, Northern Gulf of Riga: at night west, southwest 6 to 11, in gusts 14 m/s, in morning decreasing, by day around west, in the evening northwest, north 4 to 8 m/s. Wave height at night 0,7 to 1,5 m, in Moonsund 0,3 to 0,8 m. Locally some precipitation. Visibility moderate to good.
night.peipsi: West, southwest 6-10, in gusts 13 m/s. Wave height 0,7 to 1,2 m. Light sleet and snow. Visibility moderate. Air temperature -1..+1°C.

day.text: Before noon cloudy with light precipitation in many places. Afternoon clearing up from northern regions. Wind is veering northwest, north 3-8, on coast in gusts 12 m/s. Air temperature 0..+3, on coast up to 5°C.
day.peipsi: West, northwest wind decreasing 3-7 m/s. Wave height 0,3-0,8 m. Light snow and sleet. Visibility moderate. Air temperature 0..+2°C.

night.text: Variable cloudy and dry. Northwest, north wind 2-7 m/s. Air temperature -2..-6, on coast -2..+2°C.

day.text: Variable cloudy. In many places some sleet and snow, in costs rain too. Northwest, north wind 3-9 m/s. Air temperature -2..+3°C.

night.text: Variable clouds and locally on costal areas some snow and sleet. Northwest, north wind 2-7 m/s. Air temperature -1..-6, on coast locally to +2°C.

day.text: Cloudy with bright spells. Light snow or sleet in many places. Westerly wind 3-9 m/s. Air temperature -2..+3°C.

night.text: Cloudy with snow and sleet. On mainland wind around west 4-9, in islands and coast becoming northwest, north and increasing 8-13, in gusts up to 17 m/s. Air temperature 0..-4, on islands and coast 0..+2°C.

day.text: Cloudy with bright spells with snow in many places. Northwest, north wind 5-11, on coasts in gusts 15, in the afternoon veering on northern coast northeast and increasing 10-14, in gusts up to 18 m/s. Air temperature -2..+2°C.
